Question: This person also ordered five separate naval bombardments of Tripoli, which restored peace in the Mediterranean for a while.
Hints: This person believed assimilation was best for Native Americans; second best was removal to the west.
This person began his childhood education under the direction of tutors at Tuckahoe along with the Randolph children.
This person moved into the South Pavilion (an outbuilding) in 1770, where his new wife, Martha, joined him in 1772.
